projects.name: ViDoc (Virtual Doctor)
projects.description: Executed a solo project for Technological Business Hackathon 2.0 | AIESEC, advancing to the penultimate round. Designed and implemented a user-friendly website for the elderly population, emphasizing intuitive navigation and simplified interfaces; Github decreased user error rate by 40% and increased engagement by 50%, resulting in improved user satisfaction.

projects.name: Project DRISHTI
projects.description: Led the implementation of Project-Drishti, deploying Raspberry Pi, GPS, and webcams for real-time tracking, resulting in a 30% improvement in security through accurate monitoring of police personnel at crowded events. The project leverages IoT tools like Raspberry Pi, Python, Opencv, I2C, along with embedded systems (Neo-6m GPS, Mini-Mic, USB Web-Camera), and web technologies (HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Firebase, Google Maps). It achieves a 20% improvement in personnel position deviation detection through precise monitoring with OpenCV.

projects.name: DigiCLONE
projects.description: Developed a robust platform for simulating digital communication lab experiments, especially those involving hardware-based processes like companding, resulting in a 50% reduction in lab setup time for educational institutions. Built using the Flutter framework, the app ensures a seamless and interactive user experience on mobile devices.

experiences.description: Spearheaded collaborative Quantum Electronics research project; utilized Silvaco and Nexnano tools for advanced modelling of high-frequency electronic devices, resulting in groundbreaking insights shaping future technological advancements.
Harnessed the Twitter API for real-time data in a machine learning project for the 2023 state elections in Rajasthan and Telangana. Achieved 70% accuracy in identifying fake accounts.

Examined a years Seattle Airbnb trends using Python (NumPy, Pandas, Matplotlib, Seaborn). Identified customer patterns, preferences, and market dynamics, informing strategic decisions and enhancing market understanding.
Integrated Pixhawk and ArduPilot with AI/ML algorithms for leaf image processing in agricultural robotics. Enhanced plant health assessment accuracy by 25% and optimized crop management strategies.

full_output.name: Arnov Paul
achievements_and_awards: CSNT24, IEEE Conference, for research paper on Machine Learning.
ICCCNT24, IIT Mandi, IEEE Conference, for research paper on Natural Language Processing.
